content: cherry heart nature s walk sandra paul www cherryheart co uk introduction #natureswalkcal originally released during autumn 2019 in parts for the third cherry heart / black sheep wools crochet along after our previous two crochet along projects the spice of life and a spicier life his time the project is modular making the blanket up from a series of crochet blocks this pattern also provided a great introduction to working with charts for the first time and to my complete surprise and delight this blanket has become just as loved and enjoyed as the previous patterns the idea for this blanket came to me while i was out walking my dog and i suppose it s not really surprising that my inspiration came from my beautiful natural surroundings the time i spend walking along out in the open with my four-legged friend beside me is a beautifully calm and soothing moment in my day a little time-out from all else that may be going on and an opportunity to re-set and soak up the peace of the landscape my hope for this blanket is that it will invoke those same feelings for you while making it the rhythm of the stitches in each square bringing a calm and peaceful moment to your days i m so pleased that we were still able to offer another entire blanket pattern completely free for everyone to enjoy and you ll find that this free version includes everything you need to make a beautiful blanket including 6 beautiful square designs each with a clear crochet chart full joining layout and border instructions nature s walk pdf version there is also now an updated pdf version of this pattern available in my pattern shop you ll find all the information in this free pattern together with all the additional help and information from the original blanket consolidated together into one file it also includes the following extra content bonus content pdf only - the additional 6 bonus squares complete with charts to complement the pattern and slot seamlessly into the blanket design these were originally only available separately - the bonus square layout to show to be arrange all 12 square designs into a harmonious blanket - photo tutorials for special/intermediate stitches and clear photos to make sure everything is easy to follow - new this pattern now includes a completely new crochet chart for the border - new a yarn colour card for you to keep track of yarn colours or create your own palette - new a blanket blank to colour yourself and help you plan out your custom colours for more information or to purchase the pdf version visit my nature s walk page nature s walk pdf version https //www cherryheart co uk/2019/08/natures-walk-cal html copyright © 2019 sandra paul all rights reserved this pattern is for your own personal and individual use only to copy reproduce redistribute exchange or re-sell this pattern in whole or in part in any format
